ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] New person to the list not new to EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh hey, sweet! Finally somebody else who plays on Tarew Marr server. :) I haven t really experienced the LDoN problems that you re talking about, but I don t
ygData.messageBody:
Oh hey, sweet! Finally somebody else who plays on Tarew Marr server. :)

I haven't really experienced the LDoN problems that you're talking about,
but I don't tend to do many LDoN adventures anymore unless friends are
online. Then, even if it's just three of us, we might just do an adventure
without recruiting a full team (we win about 3/4 of the time with a
three-person team, but certain types of adventures are nearly impossible,
like assassinations).

My biggest complaint is the insistence of far too many players that an LDoN
group absolutely needs a cleric in the mix. I've wasted more hours than I
care to count sitting there with a perfectly-suitable five-person group just
because the group refuses to budge without a cleric. Not fun at all. X(

Anyway, if you want, look me up on Tarew Marr server. My main, a 45th level
ranger, is named Crispinus.

Chris

-----Original Message-----
From: Cary Benford [mailto:wishbear22@...]
Sent: January 28, 2004 11:29 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] New person to the list not new to EQ


Hello all!

I just thought I would introduce myself. My name is
Cary. I'm 25 years old married. Both my husband and I
play EQ. He is the one that got me hooked.

My Characters:
Venetia Valgrave - Lvl 43 Ench High elf - Currently
gaining exp to dungeon groups and not liking it

Clawdya Valgrave Lvl 23 - Beastlord Kitty - Currently
in PC

I play on the the Tarew Marr server with my husband
Morrdak Valgrave who is a lvl 52 Iksar SK. Also a
bunch of My RL friends play on that server. We all
have the family name of Valgrave. Its pretty funny.
Hehe

I'm trying to level to 46 as quickly as possible so I
can level in POJ with my friends who are in their 50's
now. It sucks not being able to level with them. The
Dungeon groups suck because everybody is sooo rude and
I have been jipped out of split 4 times now.

Well I just thought I would introduce myself!

Cary
